bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXIII (Nos 2354-2382)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel Edgar, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXIII (Nos 2354-2382). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. 34.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1956, 8°, xii-112 pp. et XI pll.

C.R. par William M. Calder III, CP 54 (1959) pp. 73-74. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 36 (1956) pp. 275-277. - John A. Davison, JHS 77 (1957) pp. 345-346. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 26 (1957) p. 391. - Carlo Gallavotti, Gnomon 29 (1957) pp. 419-425. - Hugh Lloyd-Jones, CR N.S., 8 (1958) pp. 16-22. - J.S. Lurie, VDI 69, 1959, fasc. 3) pp. 191-198. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 33 (1958) No. 65, pp. 137-141. - Augusto Traversa, Paideia 12 (1957) pp. 138-139. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 8 (1957) p. 565.
